QuestData.Title: Spiteful Spirits
QuestData.Description: The spirits of the fallen villagers have risen! I can feel the hatred emanating from the spirits.$B$B$n, if we are to survive here, we must defend ourselves. This is the only way we can put them to rest.
QuestData.RewardText: Well done. We cannot bring them retribution, but at least we can end their rage.
